Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Jarvis
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Jarvis due to a unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Jarvis due to a unauthorized person on the tracks. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#151 Sheridan

#96 Lunt

#155 Devon

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Jefferson Park
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jefferson Park due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jefferson Park due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#56 Milwaukee

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
